author: agrubercms
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds an L1 filter based on the L1P2GT for the Phase-2 tau HLT paths. We still need to check the impact on the paths' efficiencies (hence Draft mode), but an L1 filter will need to be added at some point in any case (maybe with additional seeds from L1, once available).

#### PR validation:
title: L1 filters using P2GT for tau paths
